job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's Degree in computer science or equivalent experience

jd: From: Abhi, SPAR INFORMATION SYSTEMS abhi@sparinfosys.com Reply to: abhi@sparinfosys.com Hi, Please find the job description below and let me know your interest.LOCAL ID OF NY REQUIREDTitle: Sr Java DeveloperDuration: ContractWork Location: NYC, NY Mandatory Skill-11+ years of hands-on experience with Java, Spring boot, Microservices.Good Exposure to micro servicesBackground in Scrum/Agile development methodologies.Capable of delivering on multiple competing priorities with little supervision.Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Bachelor's Degree in computer science or equivalent experience. The most successful candidates will also have experience in the following:GitlowAtlassian products – Bitbucket, JIRA, Confluence etc.Continuous Integration tools such as Bamboo, Jenkins.
